• Strip #1

    Stephen: You know, we're out of grapes. In fact, we've been out of grapes for a long time now. Sid: Ha! You were the first one to complain about it! Now you have to buy the groceries! Stephen: What? That's not the rule. Sid: Sure it is. Remember? [[In Blackness]] Caption: Five Years Ago Sid: This plan I put forth for your hearing: that he who gripes about grapes shall be he who goes to get goods. Stephen: This rule I realize to be right, for in fairness I find no flaw. Stephen: I don't talk that way. Sid: It was the past. Everyone talked funny then. {{title text: pay no attention to the bowl of fresh fruit behind them}}
